mapper.sql: t.id, t.code, t.i_id, t.org_id, t.type, t.state, t.parts_atl_id, t.mat_atl_id, t.parts_pat_id, t.mat_pat_id ,t.remark, t.create_time, t.fail_num, t.a_id, t.parts_atl_result, t.mat_atl_result, t.parts_pat_result, t.mat_pat_result, t.parts_atl_times, t.mat_atl_times, t.parts_pat_times, t.mat_pat_times, t.confirm_time, t.info_apply, t.result_apply, t.t_id, t.result, t.is_receive,t.parts_atl_code,t.mat_atl_code,t.parts_pat_code,t.mat_pat_code, t.draft, t.atl_type, t.atl_remark, t.reason_id, t.expect_date, t.atl_item, t.stand_i_id, t.approve_account_id, t.trainsmit_account_id, t.examine_account_id
mapper.select: select from task t where t.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert:
SELECT @@IDENTITY
insert into task (code, i_id, org_id, type, state, parts_atl_id, mat_atl_id, parts_pat_id, mat_pat_id, remark, create_time, fail_num, a_id, parts_atl_result, mat_atl_result, parts_pat_result, mat_pat_result, parts_atl_times, mat_atl_times, parts_pat_times, mat_pat_times, confirm_time, info_apply, result_apply, t_id, result, is_receive, parts_atl_code, mat_atl_code, parts_pat_code, mat_pat_code, draft, atl_type, atl_remark, reason_id, expect_date, atl_item, stand_i_id, approve_account_id, trainsmit_account_id, examine_account_id) values (#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{partsAtlId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{matAtlId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{partsPatId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{matPatId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{failNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{aId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{partsAtlResult,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{matAtlResult,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{partsPatResult,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{matPatResult,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{partsAtlTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{matAtlTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{partsPatTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{matPatTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{confirmTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{infoApply,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{resultApply,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{result,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isReceive,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{partsAtlCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{matAtlCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partsPatCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{matPatCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{draft,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{atlType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{atlRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reasonId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{expectDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{atlItem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{standIid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{approveAccountId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{trainsmitAccountId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{examineAccountId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update:
update task
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
i_id = #{iId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
a_id = #{aId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
parts_atl_id = #{partsAtlId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, mat_atl_id = #{matAtlId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, parts_pat_id = #{partsPatId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, mat_pat_id = #{matPatId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
fail_num = #{failNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
parts_atl_result = #{partsAtlResult,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mat_atl_result = #{matAtlResult,jdbcType=INTEGER},
parts_pat_result = #{partsPatResult,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mat_pat_result = #{matPatResult,jdbcType=INTEGER},
parts_atl_times = #{partsAtlTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mat_atl_times = #{matAtlTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
parts_pat_times = #{partsPatTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mat_pat_times = #{matPatTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
confirm_time = #{confirmTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
info_apply = #{infoApply,jdbcType=INTEGER},
result_apply = #{resultApply,jdbcType=INTEGER},
t_id = #{tId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
result = #{result,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_receive = #{isReceive,jdbcType=INTEGER},
parts_atl_code = #{partsAtlCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mat_atl_code = #{matAtlCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parts_pat_code = #{partsPatCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mat_pat_code = #{matPatCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
draft = #{draft,jdbcType=INTEGER},
atl_type = #{atlType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
atl_remark = #{atlRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reason_id = #{reasonId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
expect_date = #{expectDate,jdbcType=DATE},
stand_i_id = #{standIid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
atl_item = #{atlItem,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
approve_account_id = #{approveAccountId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
trainsmit_account_id = #{trainsmitAccountId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
examine_account_id = #{examineAccountId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update task set state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update task set draft = #{draft,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select from task t where t.type = 1 and t.i_id in #{id} order by t.create_time desc
